title: MIT Technology Review Report (È∫ªÁúÅÁêÜÂ∑•ÁßëÊäÄËØÑËÆ∫)
content: PhD student Zhengru Fang and his team at City University of Hong Kong had multiple AI agents explore a virtual maze together, giving them only one extremely simple goal‚Äîto learn to predict what their companions would see and where they would go in the next second. The results showed that these agents not only learned to cooperate efficiently but also spontaneously formed 'map cells' similar to those in animal brains within their 'minds,' and even developed a secret language only they could understand.

title: Best Paper Award at GLOBECOM'25
content: Our paper "UAV-enabled Computing Power Networks: Task Completion Probability Analysis" has received the Best Paper Award at IEEE GLOBECOM'25!!!

title: Thanksgiving Gathering
content: Our lab came together for a warm Thanksgiving gathering. Everyone was very happy and enjoyed the celebration.

title: Congratulations to Yang Song on Equinix Appointment
content: Congratulations to Dr. Yang Song, our former member at UF, who has just joined Equinix as SVP, Chief Data Science and AI Officer!!! Check the news for more detail.

title: Visit from Fukui Prefectural Koshi High School, Japan
content: The JC STEM Lab of Smart City was pleased to welcome students and teachers from Fukui Prefectural Koshi High School, Japan, for a visit on 24 October. The students toured our facilities and saw live demonstrations of our smart city research, including IoT sensors and data analytics platforms. The visit fostered a great exchange of ideas, and we hope it inspired the students in their future STEM pursuits. We thank our guests for their lively engagement and look forward to more such collaborations.

title: Prof. Zhang Won The 2025 IEEE ComSoc AP WICE Outstanding Achievement Award

title: Three Lab Members Awarded Scholarships
content:
Outstanding Academic Performance Scholarship (OAPA): Zhengru Fang, Yihang Tao
Research Tuition Scholarship (RTS): Senkang Hu
Chow Yei Ching School of Graduate Studies Scholarship (CYCSGS): Senkang Hu (sole awardee in the Department of Computer Science)
Congratulations to them!!!

title: Prof. Fang Elected as a Member-at-Large

title: JC STEM Labs Inauguration Ceremony
content: Officiating at the JC STEM Labs' inauguration ceremony on 3 July were Professor Lee Chun-sing, Provost and Deputy President at CityUHK; Ms Elsie Tsang, Executive Manager of Charities (Talent and Sector Development) at The Hong Kong Jockey Club (HKJC), Professor Li Wen Jung, Vice-President (Talent and International Strategy) and Professor Chan Chi-hou, Vice-President (Community Engagement) at CityUHK. They were joined by five CityUHK Global STEM Professors ‚Äî Professor Lee Duu-Jong, Professor Wang Xin, Professor Ren Yang, Professor Takashi Hibiki and Professor Fang Yuguang ‚Äî the directors of the JC STEM Labs.

title: Guangyu Will Join Huawei 2012 Lab

title: Beatriz was Promoted to Associate Professor with Tenure

title: Alex Chit-Yuen Cheng was Selected for Future Global Leader Programme
content: Congratulations to Mr. Alex Chit-Yuen Cheng, our current PhD student, who was selected for the Future Global Leader Programme (Lucy Cavendish College, University of Cambridge x City University of Hong Kong), which is only 10 people univerity-wide. Congratulations, Alex!!! This programme aims to foster a global and enterprising mindset among participants, equipping you to tackle the diverse economic and environmental challenges of the coming decades. It will serve as your gateway to unlocking your full potential as a leader while exploring the captivating wonders of the global and Asia. Check the Poster for more details.

title: Jianqing and Haichuan's Paper Receives IEEE TCGCC Best Journal Paper Award
content: Congratualtions to Jianqing and Haichuan, whose paper entitled "An Energy-Efficient Strategy for Secondary Users in Cooperative Cognitive Radio Networks for Green Communications" (J. Liu, H. Ding, Y. Cai, H. Yue, Y. Fang and S. Chen) in IEEE Journal on Selected Areas in Communications (vol. 34, no. 12, pp. 3195-3207, Dec. 2016) has been selected for the IEEE TCGCC Best Journal Paper Award by IEEE Technical Committee on Green Communications & Computing (TCGCC)!!!

title: Lab Members Win Best Paper Awards at Globecom'2015
content: Best Paper Award: The (former and current) lab members (Xuanheng Li, Linke Guo, and Dr. Fang) are congratulated on two papers winning the best paper awards at Globecom'2015 ("Economic-robust session based spectrum trading in multi-hop cognitive radio networks" (X. Li, M. Pan, Y. Song, Y. Sun and Y. Fang) and "Privacy-preserving verifiable proximity test for location-based services" (G. Zhuo, Q. Jia, L. Guo, M. Li and Y. Fang)).

title: Prof. Fang Delivers Keynote at ICCC'2013
content: Dr. Fang delivered a keynote on cognitive radio networks on 13 August, 2013, at IEEE/CIC International Conference on Communications in China (ICCC'2013), 12-14 August 2013, Xian, China.

title: Prof. Fang Delivers Keynote at WASA'2013
content: Dr. Fang delivered at a keynote on cognitive radio networks on 9 August, 2013, at the 8th International Conference on Wireless Algorithms, Systems, and Applications (WASA'2013), 7-10 August, 2013, Zhangjiajie, China.

title: Prof. Fang Selected as Editor-in-Chief of IEEE TVT
